Commands.Shell: Grants Shell for 5 turns to all party members and slightly raises their BRV.  Shell lowers magic damage taken.
Commands.Protect: Grants Protect for 5 turns to all party members and slightly raises their BRV.  Protect lowers physical (melee and ranged) damage taken.

Passives.Shell BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Shell.
Passives.Shell Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Shell.
Passives.Shell Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Shell.
Passives.Protect Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Protect.
Passives.Protect Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Protect.
Passives.Bonus Longer Protect: Grants +1 turn to all allies' Protect buff after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Shell Charge: Increases the max uses of Shell by 1.
Passives.Protect Charge: Increases the max uses of Protect by 1.
Passives.Symbol of Hope: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.
Passives.Shell Speed Up: Moderately raises Speed while Shell is active.
Passives.Shell Extend: Increases Shell's max uses by 1.Moderately raises the BRV Gain based on Attack.Slightly improves Shell's effect (Magic damage reduction).Turns HP Attack into HP Attack+ while Shell is active.HP Attack+ raises allies' BRV based on damage dealt.
Passives.Protect Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Attack and Max BRV while Protect is active.
Passives.Protect Extend: Increases Protect's max uses by 1.Moderately raises the BRV Gain based on Attack.Slightly improves Protect's effect (Physical damage reduction).Turns BRV Attack into BRV Attack+ while Protect is active.

Weapons.Skycutter CP: 15: Grants Small Attack Up for 3 turns after using Shell.
Weapons.Aile Blanc CP: 15: Slightly raises Max BRV Up and Attack while buffed.
Weapons.Hawkeye CP: 35: Extends Protect's duration.Grants Small Speed Up to all party members for 6 turns after using Protect.Raises the BRV gain of Protect.
